content:
- Blackbeard would later plan a second attempt to capture Luffy for the World Government during the Post-Enies Lobby Arc, though he ended not having to go after Luffy when Ace got in the way and Blackbeard was able to capture him and use Ace instead to be able to get into the Seven Warlords of the Sea.
- Bellamy's defeat at the hands of Luffy would cause Doflamingo to punish him for his failure. However, Bellamy would later be given a second chance after traveling to Skypeia and offering a large gold pillar retrieved from there as a gift to Doflamingo. He would then become a member of the Donquixote Pirates and encounter Luffy once again in the Dressrosa Arc.
